programme.title: The survival of immigrants in America
programme.short_synopsis: The demographic makeup of Boston in the 1930s, and the survival of immigrants in the US.
programme.medium_synopsis: A 1930's tourist guide describing Boston's demographic make-up makes Alistair Cooke reflect on how immigrants survive and prosper in America.
